Title: Provides for the review of criminal history information of prospective residents of nursing homes
Summary: Provides for the review of the criminal history information of prospective residents of nursing homes by the department of health to determine whether such prospective resident has a prior sex offense conviction or a recent completion of the sentence for a criminal conviction; requires in any such case information on such conviction shall be disclosed to the nursing home.
LawCode: Add Art 28-F §§2899-b & 2899-c, Pub Health L; add §845-e, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the executive law, in relation to the review of criminal history information concerning prospective residents of nursing homes
